title: Identification of coke species on Fe/USY catalysts used for recycling polyethylene into fuels
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22056-22062
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03608E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yongli Wang, Na Yan, Zezhou Chen
In this research, we analyze coke deposition on Fe/USY catalysts used in the polyethylene pyrolysis for fuels. We reveal the insights into the coke distribution over metal and acid sites as well as its specific molecular structure.
